course_title: Fresh Sem: Africn Amer Studies: Hist.of Black Higher Education
requirement_designation: First Year Seminar with Race & Ethnicity(*)
class_notes:
(Freshmen Only)


Title: History of Black Higher Education
This course explores the origins and development of Black higher education in the United States.  Students will examine the history of historically Black colleges and universities in-depth with special attention to how they fostered activism and expanded freedom.  The course will also consider Black students' experiences in historically white institutions.
course_description: Variable topics in African American Studies.
schedule_location: MW 10am-11:15am in Emerson Chemistry Bldg. E103
